website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch charging station that eliminates the need to buy costly batteries for your controller.
pros: Snap-down design makes it simple to connect your controller to the station
LED light illuminates red to indicate when your controllers are charging and green to indicate that your controllers are fully charged
Sleek design is sure to complement your Xbox
cons: Takes longer to charge controllers in comparison to similar stations
Sometimes can be tough to see the LED indicator light at eye level

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after only 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the first three months then it started to have problem and with one of the charging ports. We tried everything we could think of to fix it and tried troubleshooting tips we found online. It was in that search that we finally found the poor reviews. This is apparently a regular problem with these where one of the ports goes bad. It lights up like it's charging but it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: this charges two controllers super fast!
customer_reviews.text: this charges super fast!! my son was using aa batteries like they were going out of style. I've probably spent around $100 for batteries just for xbox for my son and daughter. I bought two of these and they are AMAZING!! they come with the rechargeable batteries and a plate for the back of the controller. my son could play for 5 hours, dock it, and in about 20 mins its charged and ready to play! soooo great! they also light up red for charging and green for charged (just a sliver of light near the bottom) super cool
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Battery overheated
customer_reviews.text: I installed both batteries into two controllers. I installed the controllers on the docking station, pushed them down in accordance with the instructions, and the red light came on. After a little while one light turned green while the other remained red. I waited a little longer and it was still red. I removed the battery from the controller and it was hot. I swapped the batteries between the two controllers and swapped them on the docking station. The "green" battery turned green and the "red" battery stayed red and got hot. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Really really good charger.
customer_reviews.text: Okay. So this is the second one of these I have purchased. Positives.... 1. It charges well and the batteries last a long time. 2. Red light charging, green light charged. Simple. 3. It looks really cool sitting with my Xbox One. As for the negatives. 1. The controller sits on the base to charge with three contact points on the bottom of the controller. Because of how it's designed you sometimes have to give it a little wiggle to encourage it to connect and charge. No big deal. I might add. I didn't get rid of the first one I had. Kids adopted it. Happy shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shortly after getting the family the One S at Christmas. It has already paid for it self. Our One S controllers seemed to eat batteries much faster than the 360 controllers did. Replacing batteries once a week compared to once a month on the 360. These rechargeables last us about a week before needing a recharge and that is with 2 to 3 hours of daily play. The battery indicator on the screen is a nice reminder when they need to be placed on the charger.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fast charge
customer_reviews.text: Fast charge and very easy to use. Just put the included rechargeable batteries in your controller and use the battery cover that comes with this charger. Just set the controller on the charger and within 1-2 hours have a fully charged controller. The bright red/green lights are easily seen from many angles. Red means charging. Green means charged. If you get a red flashing light reseat the controller on the charger. In rare instances with the red flashing light, make sure the battery is properly placed within the controller itself then try again. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Keck

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for Christmas gifts. Very disappointed in the product. One battery pack will display green (charged) but die within minutes. Another simply won't connect to charge, and when a pack does charge fully it does not last nearly as long as other rechargeable batteries I have used. Also the picture in the description displays a battery pack with a usb port for charging on top. The item I received does not have said port. Will not be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as soon as I bought my Xbox. This charging station is incredibly easy to use, and it's easy to tell when they're charged because of the lights changing color. It takes a little bit of elbow grease to insert the new battery packs, but it's not overly complicated. They do not take a ton of time to charge, and the battery life on this thing is crazy long. I would recommend fully charging the batteries before use, just in case. I've had this for two years at this point and it still works fantastic. If you play a lot, it will pay for itself and produces no waste, unlike batteries. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: #TeamCap

customer_reviews.title: Works well, doesn't take up too much room.
customer_reviews.text: Charges quickly. Inserting controller takes some getting used to. You cannot just set it on the charger and walk away - you have to push down until it "clicks", while maintaining the contacts between the charger and controller. My son has missed getting it pushed down completely - so, no charge. Fortunately, the base lights up red or green, so you know immediately if there is no contact.
customer_reviews.author: Hornswith

customer_reviews.title: Great charging station for Xbox controllers!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up, very easy to use, and works great. We had one of these before and it worked fine for years until a dog bowl full of water was dumped on it. And even then one side continued to work. And I'm talking about a bowl like the biggest size mixing bowl you have in your home, filled to the brim. I was sure the charging station was going to be fried and to my surprise, one side still functioned fine. This charging station is definitely worth getting and will hold up for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: LoisIris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Charger! Works EXACTLY as intended!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of other reviews said that they didn't like the fact that you had to click down the charge stand to charge your controller, but that is EXACTLY what I wanted. If you don't want that process then don't buy it. It gives me peace of mind because as soon as it turns green I popup the controller and know that it isn't being overcharged. Also, this charger (over the course of the past 4 months w/ heavy use) has not shorted or malfunctioned in any way. I had a hard time deciding which charging station to purchase and I am OVERWHELMINGLY HAPPY with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ..
customer_reviews.text: Just received my control charger and im already loving it ..it came with two sets of rechargeable batteries with control covers and dock..decided to give this a try since I was already finishing my 24pack of batteries in less than a week ..I popped in the batteries and cover and set it to charge without a problem..bottom of the base turns red when charging and I’m guessing it’s going to turn green when fully charged ..I’ll update soon to put how much game time a charge gives you ..
customer_reviews.author: Maximo

customer_reviews.title: A good charger, but it has some design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The good; it’s well constructed, the battery’s and the battery doors fit great. A full charge lasts quite some time, and they charge rather quickly. The bad; The spring loaded mechanism that the controller rests on is very finicky. When it’s in the popped up position, you place the controller on it, and press it down until it locks down. In the down position, the charger makes contact to charge the battery. Buuuuuuut....it’s sometimes a pain to get the controller centered correctly on the charging contacts....it just feels unintuitive and the controller is kinda wobbly and insecure in its charging cradle. It’s very easy to partially dislodge the controller. It does the job, but I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: com4tably.numb

customer_reviews.title: Works great, a bit fiddly
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, it sometimes takes a little bit of fidgeting with the controller to get it to sit correctly. The lights that turn on when it charges make this easy. Additionally, it keeps charging even after the battery's topped off, which probably isn't ideal. (Although no different, really, than keeping them plugged in via USB.) Again, green light says "it's charged," and it's nice that I can just "pop" the stand and it stops charging but lets me keep the controller in the cradle so I don't lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on stand. Just press down
customer_reviews.text: Update: 8 months later and the battery pack won't charge and the other one won't charge like it used to. Dropped 5 to 2 stars since it didn't even last a year Easy to use. We actually bought one for each Xbox. Once battery pack is one you just press it on until the green light comes on. My 8 year old just doesn't have the patience to put in a USB charger slowly and properly, so this was a perfect solution. No more looking in drawers when the battery goes out since there's 2 per station
customer_reviews.author: jt1515

customer_reviews.title: I would stay away from this potential fire hazard...
customer_reviews.text: Just received delivery of this and charged up my controllers. The light for one of the controllers turned green and stopped charging. The light for the second controller stayed red and after about an hour after the light for the first controller turned green, it was still red so I grabbed the controller to check it and it was VERY HOT in the battery area. I packed this up and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love the charge indicators.
customer_reviews.text: The LED lighting around the base shows very clearly the state of charge, red or green and you can see it across the room. The controller position is a very positive unlike the last set we had that you had to jiggle every now and then to get it recognized that the controller was on the base. The first charge did not seem to last as long as I was expecting. We are not hardcore gamers but being home with COVID we are using the system more than normal with netflix and some games. The battery life may be in my head and could be quite normal. Lets see if they last as long as the others did, (3-4 years).
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: Get the white version only if you have white controllers
customer_reviews.text: The back covers that are needed to cover the battery compartment and enable the battery to charge are white, so unless your controller is also white, you'll want the black version. I wish it had come with both black and white battery compartment covers, so that I would be able to have a choice. Other than that, the device charges my controllers, which was the goal. The white back covers just look tacky on a non-white controller.
customer_reviews.author: SZECSEI

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t charge sometimes. I can’t believe this is a Microsoft product. It takes a few times to have the control charge. Sometimes it’ll show it’s charging and then 20 mins it’ll blink red that it’s not charging. Even though nothing touched it. My husband and son hate it.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Not just for charging, also a simple docking station to keep your controllers neat & out of the way!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I like that you push and click it down to charge, (lighting up red if charging and green when it's fully charged), because then you can push & click again to stop the charging process so that you don't have to waste electricity by leaving the charging connection open, plus I assume a charging connection left fully charging always would most likely burn out and therefore kill the charging dock much quicker than a charging dock in which you can stop the charging connection once the charging process is complete like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Almost impossible to properly position controller
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to position controller on the charging station in order for it to get charging. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stewart

customer_reviews.title: That leaves my existing Microsoft battery packs less useful. I was hoping it would just charge from ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because the charge port on my Xbox One S Gears of War 4 controller broke. The only downside is you have to use the included battery in order to be able to use the station. That leaves my existing Microsoft battery packs less useful. I was hoping it would just charge from the bottom headset port. But it makes it easy to keep the battery charged when the controller is not in use (just set it down on the station instead of plugging in a wire). Plus the included battery packs have higher capacity than the MS batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Have had two and neither work
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we have received. The first one did not work. We returned thinking it must have been a fluke. Received a replacement. Still does not work. Looks like we are just out our money on this as we are unable to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Puryear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product! Not only does it work great, but it keeps the controllers neat and aesthetically pleasing. I was hesitant at first after reading some of the comments about the controllers not staying docked for charging. I have not had any problems with this. I have found that it does help to click down on the dock and then place the controller on it. The only complaint I have is that the battery packs are black, so if you have a colored controller (I have a turquoise controller) then the back will be a different color. It’s a minor detail and it doesn’t bother me, just a quick note.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gomez

customer_reviews.title: No more broken usb chargers for controllers!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this charger for around two months so far so good. My kids kept breaking our usb chargers which are cheap but replacing them started getting expensive. You just place the controller on the base after clicking it down in the charge position and we haven’t had any issues charging. If you want to stop buying usb chargers and have multiple controllers I recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Game on
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Was replacement t for a old one that I cant get batteries for anymore. These new ones are even better and last so much longer
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Dietz

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 performance from this
customer_reviews.text: One of the included batteries didn't last more than a week. The other is holding strong. I did notice that mine was an open box when I received it so maybe this seller is reselling returns as new. I don't know, I missed the chance to return it (who has time for that?!) so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Funk

customer_reviews.title: Really useful product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works great, just keep in mind not forever. I replace it with a new one maybe once a year. Beats buying batteries. When it's new the batteries last me nearly a week of light gaming before changing so similiar to duracell life. If you leave it charging all night I do believe it drains faster. I try to charge when I am awake and can take it off the port. Just charge it for brief spans instead of when it's completely dead. Don't buy it expecting the battery life to stay the same for years but I think it's hard to beat this product beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: First one had a defect. One side of the dock didn't work. Sent it back, no issues, quickly resolved, and received a new one that's worked for my teenage son for IDK the past 6+ months, and he games pretty hardcore. I like the design and the pop up feature that allows the controllers to chill on the dock without charging is good. Happy with the purchase and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelynray

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The contacts needed to charge the batteries do not come in contact with the batteries using the provided housing (obviously while depressed in the charging position). Some dimension or manufacturing issue is a result of a poor performance of what would have been a neat device. Works if you take off the provided cover, but that’s not the desired intent of the device or it’s user.
customer_reviews.author: DfromA

customer_reviews.title: Battery saver!
customer_reviews.text: My son was stealing my batteries constantly. We were going through them like crazy. I finally decided to get him a battery charger and both of us are so happy. The battery charge holds up great and he likes the design of it. The price for it was awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Murillo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Better than buying AAs
customer_reviews.text: Works great, saves on batteries. I didn't think about having to remove chat pad and/or sound controls every time I charge, but it should have been obvious. Minor issue with one side popping up but just have to push it back down. I just have to check for lights to verify that remotes are charging. Overall I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: blundergirl565

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and doesn't over charge
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and didn't make my controllers feel bulky. I got tired of going through batteries and have been looking to getting a charging station. This one does a really good job, and I like how you can stop it from charging by just clicking it up. Most charging station will keep trying to charge the controller whenever you place it on, while this one makes you engage the station by pushing it down. Very good
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McClain

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent charge times
customer_reviews.text: Works but only sometimes. The charger seems to show batteries as fully charged, but when they’re used we get really erratic usage times. Sometimes they last a few days, sometimes 10 minutes. Not sure if we got a bad charger or if the battery cells are bad. Regardless it’s frustrating to pick up a “charged” controller only to have to switch it out with disposables after a short time. Yes, we’re following the charging procedure. Yes the controllers are set in the charger securely and correctly. We’ve tried troubleshooting to be sure it’s not user error. It really seems to be a bad unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy these instead of other brands
customer_reviews.text: My roommate and I both use these for our xbox one s's. I was worried about getting a good charging stand and this one has worked great so far. The batteries charge fast and last a long time, long enough where we haven't had any problems. My favorite feature is that you can pop the stands up so the batteries aren't charging and it just acts as a controller stand. I believe this definitely helps with the battery life and no other stand had this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value - well built.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent item, and I’d say that even if it cost twice what I paid - everything matches, everything fits, everything works.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Talbott

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, completely compatible with my controllers. Charges them again & again with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and charges the included battery pack quickly. Knocked off a star because I was hoping for one like I have for my Xbox 360 that stops charging automatically when the battery is fully charged. This one changes the color of the light to indicate full charge, but you have to physically release the controller to prevent overcharging.
customer_reviews.author: Robert White

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it's perfect for my Xbox one controllers. I definitely did not want to change batteries every single day and this took that need away by providing a way to recharge the batteries for the controllers. The green and red lights are great for showing my little ones when the controllers are properly placed and charging and when they are done charging and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Mays

customer_reviews.title: Good charging station
customer_reviews.text: Good charging station. Like that cradles can be raised to hold and lowered to charge the controller. Bout one from the store a while back but needed one for a different xbox and this saved me $6. Had 3 nyko docks before this and the all stopped working. hese hold up well and sopprt old and new style XB1 controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Works but is extremely finnicky.
customer_reviews.text: The product works and it is nice not to have to replace batteries. It does have some annoying downfalls though. The controllers have to be perfectly lined up to charge and the lighting system that is supposed to let you know it is charging does not work very well and is in a position that is difficult to see.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bekker

customer_reviews.title: Good chargers
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about two years now I believe and have had no problems with it so far. The only thing is: you'll need to replace the small batteries themselves once they start getting old. The charger light will blink red when it's almost time to replace the actual batteries that are in the controller. Other than that, it has lasted long and gets the charging done.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great charging dock!
customer_reviews.text: The battery and the battery cover plate fit perfectly in my xbox one elite controller. It is very easy to place the controller on the charger, and because of the smart design, there is nothing to plug in. The Base of the charging dock lights up to signify charging and when the controller has completed charging. Great product, I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: My Duracell stock dropped
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I've purchased, just to have both systems with interchangeable batteries between numerous controllers. LED lights on unit make it easy to tell when ready. Fully charged in a few hours or less.
customer_reviews.author: Laszlo Sinka

customer_reviews.title: Charge Away
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical to go with a non-Xbox brand, but I’m glad I did! The price was super reasonable and the charging dock works great. Super cool that it has a charging mode and a storing mode, when the led lights go from red to green, you’ve got a fully charged remote!
customer_reviews.author: L. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome - I own 2 of them and the batteries last a long time. I just charge overnight and they last all day the next day. I’ve had no battery loss so far and they get used every single day for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Misterfiggins

customer_reviews.title: Have to line it up just right to charge
customer_reviews.text: I knocked off a star because it’s very finicky on how you put the controller on to charge. My kids put it on and don’t realize it’s not charging so the next day they still have a dead controller.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Seig

customer_reviews.title: One battery did not charge or register on the charger.
customer_reviews.text: I received the item on time. One of the batteries did not register or charge on the charging dock, which is extremely disappointing seeing as to I have two controllers. I’m going to keep the product anyway because I need it otherwise I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Steele

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, cool looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice design visually. Only thing I would change is provide a better fitting for placing a controller back in for charging. Kids in a hurry place the controller back and don't pay attention to the lights. Occasionally you have to go back and re-cradle the controller or slide it back and forth until the contacts line up.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Kavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft approved
customer_reviews.text: We are going to keep the xbox one elite going as long as possible. Not a fan of the second generation. Original recharge battery started heating up so now we have a fuel set at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great for you buck
customer_reviews.text: I got an xbox a couple of months ago and I really needed a charged. This comes with two chargeable batteries and with the stand that charges and that you can also place the controllers on.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: It works. Looks ok. It charges the controllers fast and so far they are holding the charge for a long time. I like that you can turn the charging off and have it just hold the controllers. However, I find that it feels incredibly cheap and I'm worried I'm going to break it.
customer_reviews.author: As Honest As Possible

customer_reviews.title: works great for xbox1 only
customer_reviews.text: this will definitely stop you from going through AA batteries every week or 2. So for that I love it. the only negative I could say is that it's supposed to work on old xbox controllers too. it definitely does NOT. I have an original xbox controller and the battery pack is way different. So...seems to only work on xbox 1 controllers.
customer_reviews.author: george smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charger for Xbox one controllers
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of replacing batteries on my Xbox one remote controllers and I heard about this charger from a friend. They work great and now I don’t have to spend money on buying batteries. Definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dhaval Patel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 sets of these and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can just click the controllers onto the charging dock when you're not using them so that they always stay fully charged. We haven't had any problems and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Shae_Mills

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: No complains easy to insert battery and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Very good charging station!
customer_reviews.text: Very good charging station! It charges the battery in just a couple of hours and it last for a good 8-12 hours or more depending on how much your game uses the vibration feature of your controller. It looks cool and it's easy to use. I still can't figure out what this "Elite Door" is but whatever, it works great and I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Troy S

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. He loves it. So far, it’s working as it should with no issues. And should it fail, trust me, I will be back to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Shanee

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. The charger pops up so you can rest your controllers on the charger without worrying that the battery is constantly charging (which can be bad for battery lifespan). LEDs are not too bright, but bright enough that you can tell they are lit. Compact but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Better then wires
customer_reviews.text: A little glitchy at times. But, when it works it does its job. Feel relieved getting rid of a million cables, very easy for my 7yr old to mount and dismount the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: What a bummer...
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased with this in the beginning, but after having it for about a month the battery life on the battery packs have greatly decreased. I’m constantly having to charge my controllers when I’m really only using them to use my prime and Netflix app, and not really using them for gaming. I was excited to have this, but in the end it’s just been a big letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my boys who are constantly using batteries.
customer_reviews.author: A. Druan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend as a surprise gift because he really needed a charging dock for the batteries he got at Walmart. So far it works perfectly the lights aren't too bright and it doesn't take up space. This product is. very easy to use and came with everything shown. The packaging was great and wasn't tampered with which was a relief. Definitely would recommend if you don't want to spend a lot of money on a dock/rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charging station
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We got tired of spending so much in batteries. This charging station has a sleek look. You press the controller down on the port to charge it. The light is initially red when there's little to no charge and green when it's charged. It also works as a holder if you don't want to charge it. Just leave the controller on the port without pressing down and no light will show. The controllers are stable and dont fall off the station.
customer_reviews.author: Trix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my controller
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I did have an issue with it getting really hot once but I took the controller off and then put it back on and everything is fine. It charges the battery just fine and last long enough for me. I only play about 5 hours at a time if that but thats all I need. If the battery doesn't last, I have 3 others to use.
customer_reviews.author: Benson

customer_reviews.title: This charger is perfect. No longer running through batteries and the charging ...
customer_reviews.text: This charger is perfect. No longer running through batteries and the charging station is so fast.
customer_reviews.author: SAmidei

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any xbox user who is sick if buying new batteries. Just dock the controller when you're done using and it will always be charged.
customer_reviews.author: c.rea.97.85

customer_reviews.title: Was decent while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Worked mostly well, periodically we’d get odd red flashing from the charger. I think battery was overheating. Now it’s just dead. Barely lasted a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R Arcand

customer_reviews.title: Great charger! batteries last long
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. You can use it as a controller dock and if your controller needs to be charged just pop it down and it charges. It only takes about 1hr and half or so to charge when controller is dead. The rechargeable batteries fit well into the controller and last a long time. And it is sponsored by microsoft so that just makes you more sure that it will work. (Sense it is designed by microsoft and not some 3rd party)
